wikipedia_page.main:
Olajuwon Bamidele Adeyemo (born 13 February 1995) is a footballer who plays as a striker for Scottish League One club Cove Rangers. He started his career with UCD in Ireland before playing in Scotland for Dundee United and, on loan, East Fife. He signed for English Premier League club Watford in 2016 and left them in 2017, subsequently signing for Valdres FK in Norway. He then played non-League football in England for Walton Casuals and Lewes before returning to Ireland with Wexford in 2020. He joined Cove Rangers in 2021.
He was called up to the Nigeria under-23 team in January 2015.
